lender.name: Julius

lender.occupational_info: i help people who have been homeless and are newly housed stay housed.

lender.name: Tiffany

lender.name: Natalie
lender.loan_because: as a Canadian I am blessed with so much and would like to help others improve their lives and provide for their families.

lender.name: Pierre-François
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Francoise
lender.loan_because: pour être un humain sur la terre (Maxime Gorki)

lender.name: Carleton Wilson
lender.loan_because: It is a small thing I can do that directly benefits the lives of people who are working hard to make a better life for themselves and their families.
lender.occupational_info: I am a graphic designer who specializes in book design and typography. I also write poetry.

lender.name: Alexander
lender.loan_because: I can

lender.name: Bartzturkeymom

lender.name: Zoe
lender.loan_because: Its fun feels good and allows me to make a tangible impact on people’s lives.\r\n\r\n

lender.name: Valerie
lender.loan_because: I\'ve always wanted to be able to help people directly, but never dared offering them money! As for my choices of which people to help: I've travelled through Bulgaria and loved the land, so I grabbed the opportunity to give back.
lender.occupational_info: I teach German language and history at university.

lender.name: John
lender.occupation: Owner of a greeting card company

lender.name: patch
lender.loan_because: i care about others.
lender.occupational_info: design programs for the web

lender.name: Sarah
lender.loan_because: I am blessed with so much in my life, I want to share that blessing with others, and do something good for someone else, rather than buy more junk that I don't need or won't use.
lender.occupational_info: I work as a computer programmer at a private Christian college. I help various offices at the college be more efficient and make services available on the web.

lender.name: Margaret
lender.loan_because: Together we can change our world -- one lender and one entrepreneur at a time. Together we can make a difference.

lender.name: joelle
lender.loan_because: I'm sick about injustice, specially social injustice and women poverty. Kiva' system is one possible way to help and share.
lender.occupational_info: my job is to imagine pictures to make corporate communication easier to understand or more funny. i' m involved in various ecological and humanist organisations too, and i' m trying to save time enough for my own family!

lender.name: Brendan
lender.loan_because: I love the idea of connecting with someone across the globe by lending a helping hand. I have been extremely fortunate and have had much help in getting my career off the ground so I think its only necessary to do the same for others.
lender.occupational_info: My true passion in life is traveling. Throughout all of my adventures I have always returned with a great sense fortune but also a sense of guilt having not been able to give back. Kiva allows me the opportunity to connect with individuals throught the world and continuously assist in making their lives better.

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: I want to see people fulfill their entrepreneuriall dreams.
lender.occupational_info: I teach and support research on entrepreneurship.

lender.name: Valerie
lender.loan_because: I am lucky to be able to give a little back for all that I have received.
lender.occupational_info: I help children who have had a really hard time.

lender.name: Cable Green
lender.loan_because: Because sharing resources is the right thing to do!
lender.occupational_info: Open Education

lender.name: Glen
lender.loan_because: I've been lucky to have a lot of opportunities come my way. This is my way of trying to pass some of them along.

lender.name: Andy
lender.loan_because: It has been made so ludicrously easy to do something that will make a difference.
lender.occupational_info: As time passes, my work changes. I began as a journalist, and then worked on newspaper websites. From that I became a specialist in website content, and from that a web designer. Next year, who knows what I will be?

lender.name: Kiwi

lender.name: -=TJ=-

lender.occupational_info: I am a student, and currently I work as a contact laborer, doing jobs such as helping people organize their basements, move heavy things, repaint houses or funrniture, etc.

lender.name: jerry
lender.loan_because: it is a sensible way to help other people.
lender.occupational_info: I worked for several years as a graphic designer and used the services printing companies.

lender.name: Gina
lender.loan_because: I believe in the power of the entrepreneurial spirit. Empowering these individuals will stimulate the economies of developing countries and I think this is the only way we can create sustainable change.
lender.occupational_info: I provide phone and email support for customers using Google AdWords, which is an online advertising program. I help our advertisers solve problems and improve their marketing campaigns.

lender.name: Bob
lender.loan_because: It is a simple way to make a difference in the world.
lender.occupational_info: I live and work in the beautiful Napa Valley

lender.name: Paul Parisot & family
lender.loan_because: Micro funding is a great way to help create opportunity in someone else\'s life. What a concept.
lender.occupational_info: I produce marketing, training, news and information videos for a railroad transportation company in the U-S.

lender.name: Ken
lender.loan_because: I am dedicated to Jesus Christ. I am so grateful to Him for what he has done for me. I believe with all my heart that He is alive, and I have a personal relationship with Him. And He said that we are to look after people less fortunate than ourselves. I want His heart to be my heart. So I give, both because I care about these people, but also because I believe that it pleases Him.
lender.occupational_info: I manage projects where computer programmers develop software programs (similar to the programs used for KIVA!) to support the government\'s real estate business in British Columbia.

lender.name: Maggie
lender.loan_because: I want to help others succeed
lender.occupational_info: I supervise individuals who are brokers within the financial industry.

lender.name: Logan
lender.loan_because: I believe that through redistribution of of wealth we can equalize happiness found here on earth

lender.name: Anne
lender.loan_because: I feel like I'm helping an individual directly; someone I wouldn't otherwise know about.

lender.name: Dan

lender.occupational_info: My work as a real estate broker is many hours and using brain. My work as a fireman is fun and gives me sense of happiness.

lender.name: ray
lender.loan_because: I can, and these people really deserve all the help we can provide.

lender.name: Christine & John
lender.loan_because: We want to share and help others achieve their goals, I care

lender.name: Diane

lender.occupational_info: I build apartment buildings and commercial buildings (offices and stores).

lender.name: Dennis

lender.occupational_info: After retiring from supervising a county shop of many mechanics I have a small farm with fruit trees and animals.

lender.name: Doret

lender.name: Christina

lender.occupational_info: I work to make one small corner of the world a safer place.

lender.name: Elena

lender.name: Alexandre

lender.name: Tarmo
lender.loan_because: Encouraging entrepreneurship has more long-lasting effects than charity. And getting rid of the huge differences in income levels might just be the easiest way to fight terrorism and crime.

lender.name: Kendra

lender.name: Kara

lender.name: Philippe

lender.occupational_info: I help to clean up contaminated sites in Canada.

lender.name: Sylvie
lender.loan_because: I want to share and help people.

lender.name: Sean
lender.loan_because: I enjoy assisting in the development of business.
lender.occupational_info: I work in the entertainment industry.

lender.name: brandon
lender.loan_because: I believe it gives people the freedom to develop the lives they choose.
lender.occupational_info: I work with small loans for small business' in the US.

lender.name: Ahna, Selena and Xavier
lender.loan_because: it is an authentic way to empower people to live their lives as they want. It\'s also very exciting for us to make a positive difference in the world. (Ahna) Because we can see so many similarities between so many people in so many other countries around the world and we can feel solidarity with them. (Selena) So people can feed their families. (Xavier)
lender.occupational_info: René (my husband) was a professor of Latin American Literature at the University of Minnesota. He recently passed away and is remembered, in part, through his donations to Kiva. Selena(16) and Xavier(14) are my children. I consider my work to be specific to their upbringing in that we homeschool (more specifically unschool).

lender.name: Tara
lender.loan_because: everyone deserves a chance to succeed.

lender.name: Ralph
lender.loan_because: This is my way of tithing.
lender.occupational_info: I am a writer curently writing under the pen name of Edward Wolf and my books are available at lulu.com/wolfworld.

lender.name: Darcie
lender.loan_because: it is something easy I can do to make a big difference in the lives of others.
lender.occupational_info: building strong communities through home ownership and sustainable living.

lender.name: Carl
lender.loan_because: It is difficult to not have opportunities for improving your situation, and i live in a country where i earn a good wage, and so i can help other people to improve their lives.

lender.name: Debra
lender.loan_because: I loan because it is the right thing to do. I have been blessed and can use some of it to bless others. Jesus was a giver and we should follow His example.
lender.occupational_info: I work with victims of crime and injustice, many being victims of family violence and poverty.

lender.name: Yves
lender.loan_because: I want to help people that do not have the chance to be born in a whealthy country but I think that it is better to be helped than to be assisted
lender.occupational_info: I remove stones in the kidneys by a small hole done through the skin (1 cm)

lender.name: Csangos
lender.loan_because: If I don't try to make a difference, who will?

lender.name: Alex Fisher
lender.loan_because: Do unto others as you would have them do unto you.
lender.occupational_info: Solving your technology problems so you can focus on your core business.

lender.name: Erika
lender.loan_because: Even when I'm not there with the people I loan to, I can directly help them help themselves

lender.name: Henri
lender.loan_because: I read an article in Libération (a french newspaper) describing Kiva and what it is about. I think it is a good idea to help poor people, all over the world, who cannot get loans because of high interests rates.
lender.occupational_info: I buy telecommunications services for a multinational company

lender.name: Julia
lender.loan_because: I am a firm believer of "what comes around, goes around". Many people have given a helping hand to me in my life - food, a drive to work, a helping hand, a dollar for lunch - and I must extend what I can to help someone else.
lender.occupational_info: A factory worker at night, this is physically demanding and repetitious work; not a highly desirable job. However, it is fairly steady pay with good benefits, close to my home, and supports me as I return to college, work the farm where my horse is, and help me start my own business (pet-sitting).

lender.name: Marc
lender.loan_because: I just think it's fair.

lender.name: Joyce
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference.

lender.name: Susan
lender.loan_because: God commands us to share what we have. People have helped me along the way and I want to pay it forward. These entrepreneurs inspire and amaze me - they have virtually nothing to work with but they manage to find the energy and drive within themselves to push forward and make life better for themselves and their children.
lender.occupational_info: I work for five Psychologists in a psychiatric unit of a hospital. I do all their office work; type their reports; keep files in order; set up new support groups, etc.

lender.name: Colleen
lender.occupational_info: i help find audiences for our company's children's books and TV shows

lender.name: isa & louise-mata
lender.loan_because: La Terre est toute petite et nous sommes tous sous le même ciel

lender.name: Stephanie
lender.loan_because: Other people need it more than most.
lender.occupational_info: Ad Ops for www.1up.com

lender.name: Holly
lender.loan_because: I like hard workers, especially those who build their own businesses. From them the effect multiplies thus improving the incomes and lives of others exponentially.
lender.occupational_info: Detailed

lender.name: Brandy
lender.loan_because: I have an interest in entrepreneurship and delight in the opportunity to support individuals with an entrepreneurial spirit.
lender.occupational_info: I audit financial statements of large public companies to ensure that information that investors rely on for decision making is accurate and fairly presented.

lender.name: Jennifer
lender.loan_because: I believe all humanity is related, like a family, and responsible for helping each other.

lender.name: Danièle M.
lender.loan_because: I want to help a little and feel a connection with people in different parts of the world.

lender.name: Star
lender.loan_because: I want to give folks a chance to improve their lives. This type of financing may not be available through financial institutions in their countries and perhaps all they need is a little money and encouragement . I can help them get started or expand!
lender.occupational_info: I work for a federal agency that helps US exporters expand into new markets across the world. We do this by offering services to find distributors and/or other partners for their products or services.

lender.name: Judie
lender.loan_because: I care about being part of a community.
lender.occupational_info: Lots of studying about how to take care of people when they are in need of medical care.

lender.name: God bless!
lender.loan_because:
Freely you have received, freely give. Matthew 10:8
One man gives freely, yet gains even more; another withholds unduly, but comes to poverty. Proverbs 11:24
lender.occupational_info: I am an American Soldier. I am a Warrior and a member of a team. I serve the people of the United States, and live the Army Values. I will always place the mission first. I will never accept defeat. I will never quit. I will never leave a fallen comrade. I am disciplined, physically and mentally tough, Trained and proficient in my warrior tasks and drills. I always maintain my arms, my equipment and myself. I am an expert and I am a professional. I stand ready to deploy, engage, and destroy, the enemies of the United States of America in close combat. I am a guardian of freedom and the American way of life. I am an American Soldier.

lender.name: Nermin & Friends
lender.loan_because: Less for me - More for others - Enough for all

lender.name: justin
lender.loan_because: We are all brothers and sisters in Christ
lender.occupational_info: ageing and retired

lender.name: Kevin
lender.loan_because: I like the idea that I can help somebody get started or successfully continue.

lender.name: Shanna Schiavon
lender.loan_because: Everyone deserves a helping hand...
lender.occupational_info: Marketing Consultant

lender.name: Link
lender.loan_because: A hundred years from now it will not matter what my bank account was, the sort of house I lived in, or the kind of car I drove...but that the world hopefully will be a different, and better place because I chose to help today.

lender.name: Dave Karen Connor Erik
lender.loan_because: we believe in helping people help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: We work with people, wildlife, and parks located in the Rocky Mountains of Canada.

lender.name: GASTO
lender.loan_because: I want to become an enterpreneur

lender.name: Cary
lender.loan_because: This is so cool!
lender.occupational_info: I teach English to immigrants aged 11-15 in a public middle school. I work with students from many places, but work primarily with speakers of Russian. I play guitar and sing in a rock band, write a local music column and organize a local music festival.

lender.name: Stephen
lender.loan_because: we need to help each other.
lender.occupational_info: I bake bread and sweets in my family bakery started by my grandfather 60 years ago.

lender.name: Michael
lender.occupational_info: I teach information systems and operations management at the college level.

lender.name: Sam & Lucy
lender.loan_because: We got a Kiva loan for Christmas, and it sounds cool!
lender.occupational_info: We are students. Or parents are teachers, a writer and an artist/filmmaker.

lender.name: Jakob
lender.loan_because: I think microfinance is a great idea.
lender.occupational_info: Design and develop web based software for project management, time tracking and invoicing.

lender.name: Glennie
lender.loan_because: Gandhi said 'You may never know what results come of your action, but if you do nothing there will be no result'. I don't know if helping these people may change the world. For sure, doing nothing will not help them.
lender.occupational_info: An ordinary man lost in Earth

lender.name: Nate
lender.loan_because: It seems like one of the best ways to make the world a smaller place and ensure that I'm helping someone who really needs it.

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: We all need each other to prosper and develop.
lender.occupational_info: I help clients to meet their financial goals.

lender.name: Thierry
lender.loan_because: I can and I want. I also think this is the best way to improve the developpement throught the world. It's realy more efficient than gouvernement help because it evoid corruption and non adapted project. I also like the idea of solidarity chain, the energy the we want to share.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a health mutual company

lender.name: Janice
lender.loan_because: It is a gratifying way to touch people whom I would not ordinarily meet.

lender.name: Liza
lender.loan_because: I want to help people in Asia, Africa and Latin America because when I visited Africa and live in China, and I have seen a lot of poverty. I was born in Venezuela.
lender.occupational_info: I am a 15 year old ninth grade student in Shanghai.

lender.name: Pat
lender.loan_because: I want to help people meet their potential and to help them bring their country to their full potential.
lender.occupational_info: I use the arts to help children find positive means with which to express their feelings and to find joy and hope. They also learn how to live in community and to develop basic leadership skills. As a therapist ,my goal is also to help others to feel good about themselves and fulfill their purpose in this world.

lender.name: Amy
lender.loan_because: I want to help folks who work hard get a chance to improve their lives.
lender.occupational_info: I teach people of all ages how to create things out of clay and other materials.

lender.name: Milena Arciszewski
lender.occupation: Founder and Executive Director of PandoProjects
lender.loan_because: I am inspired by the borrowers.
lender.occupational_info:
I am now starting PandoProjects, an incubator for grassroots initiatives.
I served as a Kiva Fellow in Bosnia (Zene Za Zene), Kenya (Kisumu Medical Education Trust) and the Philippines (Community Economic Ventures.)

lender.name: Allison & Mr. Pants
lender.occupation: pottery and bead studio. Gemstone shop.
lender.loan_because: i can.
lender.occupational_info: During the day I work in a studio where anyone can come in and paint pottery. The studio also does beading. We sell beads and help people complete their jewelry. Evenings and weekends, I teach photography at the Pennsylvania College of Art and Design. I'm also the co-owner of a rock shop where people buy gemstones, minerals, crystals and fossils.

lender.name: Dalia y Miguel
lender.loan_because: We think a small loan can make a big difference in the life of many people

lender.name: Jean
lender.loan_because: La vie m\'a beaucoup donné et il faut savoir renvoyer l\'ascenseur. En passant, merci à Kiva pour cette belle opportunité.\r\nLife\'s been good for me, I feel it\'s time for a payback and , by the way, thank you Kiva for this opportunity.
lender.occupational_info: Je pratique comme généraliste, mais j\'ai également développé une pratique en gynécologie et en obstétrique.\r\nI treat people for a variety of diseases, especially in the gyecology ans obstetrical field

lender.name: Nick Derington
lender.loan_because: Matthew 9:37 He said to his disciples, "The harvest is so great, but the workers are so few."
lender.occupational_info: I work for Apple computer.

lender.name: Mieke
lender.loan_because: I believe that anybody that wants to start something like a business should have a chance to do that.

lender.name: Page
lender.loan_because: well, my dad was the one who really got me involved in this. He showed it to me one day and i thought it was really cool, so for Christmas, he gave me a $100 credit, and I've been loaning ever since.
lender.occupational_info: I am a student in Oregon, USA.

lender.name: James
lender.loan_because: I am my brother's keeper

lender.name: Mansi
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Eden
lender.loan_because: I can....I consider it my honor to help others have the same basic necessities in their lives that the rest of us usually have. I believe in the idea that people don\'t really want charity, they want to take care of themselves and their families and keep their dignity while doing so!
lender.occupational_info: I work in physical rehabilitation; I help bring people back from injury or surgery so they can function in a normal or nearly normal fashion.

lender.name: Tammy
lender.loan_because: I want to be able to help others better themselves and their families
lender.occupational_info: right now I am a full time student completing my honours in psychology

lender.name: Jennie
lender.loan_because: I believe in solidarity.
lender.occupational_info: I sell to foreign publishers around the world the right to translate into their language the books we publish in French.

lender.name: Rob
lender.loan_because: Everyone deserves a chance to make it on their own. If corporations won't take the civic responsibility and do it, the rest of us have to pick up the slack.
lender.occupational_info: I work in television and film.

lender.name: Gwen
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a star-up company and manage an online publication in France, part of a social network for students in France.

lender.name: The Salazars
lender.loan_because: We believe that we each have the power to lift one another up, make a difference and turn our world into a beautiful place once more.
lender.occupational_info:
Bryanne: I am a college student/tutor and a mother (the most important job of all). My # 1 job is to raise my 2 sons to become intelligent adults who will help change the world for the better.
Alvaro: I am an active duty U.S. Marine, who believes through action, great change can be accomplished.

lender.name: Alex
lender.loan_because: These people are working hard and they just need a little help and I\'m lucky enough to be able to help. Also, it just makes me feel good.

lender.name: Sarah
lender.loan_because: I hope others will be inspired to do the same. It is a blessing just to be of some kind of help, however small. I hope that the reciepiant will be as blessed as I was in loaning this money.

lender.name: Aleah
lender.loan_because: We're all in this together.
lender.occupational_info: I try to help people find answers.

lender.name: Anna
lender.loan_because: it makes me feel good!!
lender.occupational_info: I go to college and work part time

lender.name: deb
lender.loan_because: We are sitting today on the threshold of the greatest economic boom in history.
lender.occupational_info: The lack of wealth is easily repaired but the poverty of the soul is irreplaceable.......by Michel Eyquen Montaigne

lender.name: Andrew
lender.loan_because: Everybody deserves a chance to profit from their own endeavours.
lender.occupational_info: I help small businesses to become a part of the internet.

lender.name: AJ
lender.loan_because: I want to change the world one loan at a time.

lender.name: Pete
lender.loan_because: This is a unique opportunity to maximize the value of your charitable allocations.
lender.occupational_info: We help provide mentors and opportunities for at risk youth in Arizona

lender.name: Earth Spirits
lender.loan_because: as a group of women supporting each other, all people and the Earth, we felt it necessary to share our blessings with people in need in other countries instead of exchanging gifts at this holiday season.
lender.occupational_info: Earth Spirits Herbal Apothacary and Holistic Center is dedicated to promoting well-being in body, mind and spirit. We draw upon the gifts of the Earth, our intuitiveness and community to bring healing to all who are drawn to us.

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: I like having the opportunity to help others achieve a significant difference in their everyday living circumstances. With Kiva; many can achieve an income to support their families. Kiva creates a person to person level of helping and caring.

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: it feels good to be able to provide an opportunity to entrepeneurs in the developing world.
lender.occupational_info: I help businesses figure out and implement their strategy

lender.name: Tim
lender.loan_because: It's something small I can do.
lender.occupational_info: I hunt hackers.

lender.name: Kelly
lender.loan_because: I think that everyone should be able to feed, clothe, and educate their family and themselves....and to lead a happy and fulfilling life while doing it! I also don\'t think it\'s acceptable that the people in the most dire situations are generally denied access to the very tools that could improve their lives.

lender.name: Joshua
lender.loan_because: I want to help others who are interested in helping themselves.

lender.name: James & Susan Dunn
lender.loan_because: My Grandaughter Becca asked me to join her in this endeavor
lender.occupational_info: Susan and I are retired in the mountains of North Carolina. Susan is a retired high school math and chemistry teacher. I am a retired CEO of a technology company.

lender.name: Jean-François
lender.loan_because: Every woman, every man, every child on the Earth should live with dignity
lender.occupational_info: My job embraces both research and teaching about how to make the soil more fertile, especially in the tropics, and how to detect and counteract pollution

lender.name: Henri
lender.loan_because: Je vis dans un pays riche (la France), de façon tout à fait convenable. Je trouve anormale la façon dont nos pays riches profitent des pays pauvres (ressources, travail). J'essaie donc, dans la mesure de mes moyens, d'aider des gens moins favorisés que moi.

lender.name: Bernardo & Camelia
lender.loan_because: Market economy is not a synonym for capitalism. We prefer the former. We don’t believe in charity, we prefer mutual aid.

lender.name: Nanz
lender.loan_because: That\'s what I do.

lender.name: James Yeang
lender.loan_because:
everyone should be able to make a better tomorrow.
Contact me at: jamesyeang at gmail dot com

lender.name: Fran
lender.loan_because: I think it is an amazing opportunity to help others help themselves! I was given this gift by one of my students.

lender.name: Renata
lender.loan_because: I can, so why not? :)

lender.name: Yvonne
lender.loan_because: We should always give more than we take. \r\n

lender.name: Bruce & Shannon
lender.loan_because: I appreciate the courage it takes to start a business
lender.occupational_info: he - mechanical project engineer for an oil refinery. she - banking operations support

lender.name: Rajat
lender.loan_because: It's the least I can do.
lender.occupational_info: Playing with technology in the hope of making life easier.

lender.name: Kathy
lender.loan_because: I think this really helps people in a more direct way.
lender.occupational_info: I liaise..

lender.name: julien + les filles
lender.loan_because: I find micro credit the most satisfyaing way to help others. i also find Kiva very easy to work with and even if more Journal entry would be nice, the projetcts are well described.
lender.occupational_info: currently in between jobs...

lender.name: ANIL
lender.loan_because: To give back is simply the right thing to do
lender.occupational_info: Provide land use advice that helps inform the management of public lands in the province of Ontario

lender.name: Mike
lender.occupational_info: I sell software that helps businesses solve ptoblems

lender.name: Linda
lender.loan_because: I believe in supporting sustainable businesses. I believe it's the best way to change the world and help others out of poverty.
lender.occupational_info: I teach college students about healthy food and what they should eat. Good nutrition.

lender.name: Carl
lender.loan_because: There is a need, and I want to help other small business people.
lender.occupational_info: I help to elliminate excess waste in the repair of wide format printers and plotters. I do this by finding ways to rebuild failed units, or redesign parts so that the parts last far longer than they otherwise would.

lender.name: Johanna
lender.loan_because: It gives people opportunity.

lender.name: Lizzie
lender.occupational_info: I am the program manager for communications at a nonprofit organization in New York.

lender.name: eric
lender.loan_because: I try to support the Golden Rule i.e.help others in a way I would like others to help me in similar circumstances.
lender.occupational_info: I am 85 and my wife is 86-we have been married and together for 62 years

lender.name: Carol
lender.loan_because: I know what it is like getting started as a business owner and would like to have a part in helping others achieve a good start also in having a family business.
lender.occupational_info: My husband Jerry and I and our 2 sons operate a specialty peppers farm where we grow hot peppers and make many products using peppers. We try to let people know the many health benefits of using peppers in family cooking.

lender.name: Rozelle
lender.loan_because: It's such a worthwhile cause. It's a way of empowering people to make their own lives better, and instills in them the belief that they are truly worth investing in.
lender.occupational_info: My job is to keep my beautiful Daughter safe, happy, entertained and educated. I love my job :)

lender.name: Kayley
lender.loan_because: I believe that my purpose in life is to help people. By loaning to others, I feel good knowing that I have aided others in numerous ways.

lender.name: Jerry
lender.loan_because: As a small business owner, I know how it is to get started with a family business. I would like to help others when I can to achieve this also.
lender.occupational_info: My wife and I and two sons own and operate a family farm where we grow specialty peppers. We make many products using peppers and we try to let people know the many benefits of using peppers in their family cuisine.

lender.name: Wade
lender.loan_because: I want to help.
lender.occupational_info: I inspect composite and metal details and assemblies used in the production of large commercial aircraft, to insure they conform to quality, engineering requirements and regulatory laws.

lender.name: Paul & Brandi
lender.loan_because: We want give back on a global level.
lender.occupational_info: Brandi and I are both teachers. I teach university students and carry out applied research in community development. My wife, Brandi is an elementary school teacher and is interested in autism awareness & environmental sustainability.

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: It is a good and appropriate thing to share one's gifts.
lender.occupational_info: I am in the energy business; oil gas and coal.

lender.name: WTAMU - SIFE Team
lender.loan_because: To promote entrepreneurship around the world.
lender.occupational_info: Students in Free Enterprise is an organization in US Universities promoting entrepreneurship, financial literacy, business ethics, environmental sustainability, and market economics.

lender.name: Mariann
lender.loan_because: I need to do something to help others.
lender.occupational_info: I sit in front of a computer a lot.

lender.name: Tom
lender.loan_because: I can
lender.occupational_info: Interesting

lender.name: Kris
lender.loan_because: Giving people the opportunity to create and sustain fulfilling lives is the best way to share joy and support peace

lender.name: Bob, Lara & Ethan
lender.loan_because: We loan because we want to help others and set this example for our son.

lender.name: Ron
lender.loan_because: What better way to make a positive impact on a fellow human being!

lender.name: Mike
lender.loan_because: I believe in giving people a chance to help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: Manage Rental Property

lender.name: Debbie
lender.occupational_info: treat children with heart defects and heart problems

lender.name: Christian
lender.loan_because: I like feeling like George Bailey sticking it to Old Man Potter from the movie It's a Wonderful Life.
lender.occupational_info: I work with computers. But more specifically I work with how computerized data can be used to greatly improve the efficiency of any business. Hablo Español.

lender.name: Oliver

lender.name: Maureen
lender.loan_because: According to Dolly Levi, "Money must be spread around, encouraging young things to grow".
lender.occupational_info: I play a small part in developing drugs for grievous diseases.

lender.name: Holly
lender.loan_because: this is an incredible idea. A wonder someone didn't think of it sooner. Microfinance is worthy of (and received) a Nobel Peace Prize =D

lender.name: Sue
lender.loan_because: Believe in self-help and grassroots, local efforts.
lender.occupational_info: Local volunteer with Habitat for Humanity and support international relief efforts. Occupation is health research, primarily enviornmental health issues.

lender.name: Robin
lender.loan_because: "To whom much is given, much is expected."

lender.name: Karen
lender.loan_because: "We can do no great things;only small things with great love." -Mother Theresa

lender.name: lpkb
lender.loan_because: I am saving money to start my own business but don\'t have enough yet...in the meantime others can use it.
lender.occupational_info: I make websites, brochures, logos, and so on -- for non-profit, social justice, environmental, peace, and educational groups.

lender.name: brichris
lender.loan_because: In a small way, help people become what they can become ... to support the dreams of others.
